Active treatment vapocoolant spray ( Pain Ease Medium Stream ) spray ) use . There placebo ( sterile water ) study . Because venipuncture painful procedure , vapocoolant may confer benefit relief pain .

Examples include : patient peripheral vascular disease , gangrene , Raynaud 's disease , Buerger 's disease .
